name: reporting
description: npm init   express   body-parser   mongoose   concurrently scripts   start: node server.js   server: nodemon server.js server.js   express, mongoose, bodyParse   initialize express   bodyParser middleware for json   mongoose connect for localhost     add promises for success and failure of connection   define PORT & app.listen

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
